title: Why Marvel Movies Are America’s Greek Myths, QAnon Invades Yoga Studios 7.19.21
itunes:title: Why Marvel Movies Are America’s Greek Myths, QAnon Invades Yoga Studios 7.19.21
description:
In episode 953, Jack and guest host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian, physician, and HypochondriActor co-host Priyanka Wali to discuss Covid-19 cases, the wellness world having a QAnon problem, California's new guaranteed income program, the cost of living going up, the unprecedented flooding in Western Europe, a box office update, and more! Plus Joelle defends Loki and MCU fandom!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Covid-19 Positive Case List (From 1 July Onwards) 
  2. California’s yoga, wellness and spirituality community has a QAnon problem
  3. QAnon Just Keeps Making Inroads into New Age Wellness Circles
  4. California approves $35 million plan for nation's first state-funded guaranteed income program
  5. How Inflation Became the Gasbags’ Favorite Moral Panic
  6. Floodwaters still rising in western Europe with death toll over 120
  7. ‘Loki’ just gave us Marvel’s best Disney Plus finale yet
  8. ‘Luca’ Leads Nielsen Movie Streaming Rankings With Huge Launch
  9. LISTEN: Empara Mi - Ditch

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
